films.title: Inception
films.description: Dom Cobb, a skilled thief, and his team specialize in entering people's dreams to steal their deepest secrets. As they navigate the surreal landscape of the subconscious, Cobb grapples with his own haunted past and the quest for redemption.

comments.text: The ending left me questioning reality.
Did you know that Da Vinci painted the Mona Lisa?

films.title: The Shawshank Redemption
films.description: Andy Dufresne, a banker wrongly convicted of murder, forms unlikely friendships within Shawshank State Penitentiary. Through his determination and hope, he transforms the prison community and discovers the true meaning of freedom.

comments.text: One of the greatest movies of all time!
The friendship between Andy and Red is heartwarming.

films.title: Pulp Fiction
films.description: In a non-linear narrative, 'Pulp Fiction' intertwines the lives of hitmen, a boxer, and a gangster's wife in a series of interconnected stories filled with witty dialogue, unexpected twists, and moments of dark humor.

films.title: The Dark Knight
films.description: Gotham City faces chaos as Batman confronts the Joker, a criminal mastermind bent on proving that anyone can become corrupt. The Dark Knight must navigate moral dilemmas and face the ultimate choice to save his city.

films.title: Forrest Gump
films.description: Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, recounts his extraordinary life journey. From playing college football to serving in Vietnam, his story unfolds against the backdrop of significant historical events, showcasing the power of simplicity and love.

comments.text: Life is like a box of chocolates!

films.title: The Matrix
films.description: Neo, a computer hacker, discovers the truth about his reality â€“ a simulated world controlled by intelligent machines. Joined by rebels, he battles agents and seeks to free humanity from the illusion of the Matrix.

comments.text: The red pill or the blue pill?

films.title: The Godfather
films.description: The Corleone family, led by patriarch Vito Corleone, navigates the complex world of organized crime. As rivalries and betrayals unfold, the Godfather must make decisions that will shape the future of his family and legacy.

films.title: Schindler's List
films.description: Oskar Schindler, a German businessman, risks everything to save the lives of Jewish workers during the Holocaust. His journey from profiteer to savior explores themes of humanity, sacrifice, and the impact of one person's actions.

films.title: Fight Club
films.description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a charismatic soap salesman. As the club grows, their unconventional activities take a dark turn, challenging societal norms and the protagonist's own sanity.

films.title: The Silence of the Lambs
films.description: FBI trainee Clarice Starling seeks the help of Dr. Hannibal Lecter, a brilliant yet disturbed serial killer, to catch another murderer on the loose. As she delves into the minds of criminals, a psychological cat-and-mouse game unfolds.
